sections.heading: Transfer of Michigan Council on Future Mobility From Department of Transportation to the Department of Labor and Economic Opportunity by Type III Transfer; Abolishment of Michigan Council on Future Mobility; Creation of the Michigan Council on Future Mobility and Electrification as Advisory Body Wit
sections.text: Transfer of Michigan Council on Future Mobility From Department of Transportation to the Department of Labor and Economic Opportunity by Type III Transfer; Abolishment of Michigan Council on Future Mobility; Creation of the Michigan Council on Future Mobility and Electrification as Advisory Body Within Department of Labor and Economic Opportunity; Composition; Powers, Duties, and Functions; Implementation and Transfer of Powers, Duties, and Functions.
